description: Returns slot type information as follows: The operation requires permission for the lex:GetSlotTypes action.

nested_items.name: slotTypes
nested_items.description: An array of objects, one for each slot type, that provides information such as the name of the slot type, the version, and a description.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the slot type.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: A description of the slot type.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedDate
nested_items.description: The date that the slot type was updated. When you create a resource, the creation date and last updated date are the same.

nested_items.name: createdDate
nested_items.description: The date that the slot type was created.

nested_items.name: version
nested_items.description: The version of the slot type.

nested_items.name: nextToken
nested_items.description: If the response is truncated, it includes a pagination token that you can specify in your next request to fetch the next page of slot types.
